File Metacommunity.cpp¶

Contains the Class Metacommunity class for generating a neutral metacommunity.

Contents

  • Definition (necsim/Metacommunity.cpp)
  • Detailed Description
  • Includes

Definition (necsim/Metacommunity.cpp)¶

  • Program Listing for File Metacommunity.cpp

Detailed Description¶

Samuel Thompson MIT Licence. For use with completed simulations from NECSim, using the SpeciationCounter program. Individuals will be drawn from the metacommunity for each speciation event, instead of creating a new species each time. Contact: samuel.thompson14@imperial.ac.uk or thompsonsed@gmail.com
